info.title: Logistics Backend API
info.description: API for managing shipments, shipment loads, and load items in a logistics system

containerType.description: Type of the container (e.g., Dry, Reefer, High Cube)

weight.description: Weight of the load in kg

loadId.description: Alternative reference to shipmentLoadId for compatibility

weight.description: Weight of the item in kg

volume.description: Volume of the item in cubic meters

hazardous.description: Whether the item contains hazardous materials

value.message: User with this email already exists
